tk.luminos.filesystem

Class ColladaLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • tk.luminos.filesystem.ColladaLoader

  • public class ColladaLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Loads Collada (DAE) files to the engine for usage. It loads the controllers, visual scenes, animation, and geometry libraries.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nick Clark

      • loadColladaModel

        public static tk.luminos.filesystem.AnimatedModelData loadColladaModel(File file,
                                                                       int maxWeights)
                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the controllers, scene, and geometry to a AnimatedModelData
        Parameters:
        file - File to load animation from
        maxWeights - Maximum weight of the vertices
        Returns:
        Model data containing the joints and mesh data
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if file cannot be found

                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the collada animation to an AnimationData object
        Parameters:
        colladaFile - File to be loaded
        Returns:
